attributes.action: Stop wasting tax payers money on pointless NHS over management.
attributes.additional_details:
Obsession with Academic qualifications has reached dangerous levels. New nurses must have Degrees with no attention paid to who would make a good nurse, as long as they can write 12000 word essays. Nurses now waste days proving their worth every 3years with yet another layer of bureaucracy; with many choosing to leave/retire instead. £millions is wasted on pointless paperwork and has crippled the NHS and destroyed Nurses goodwill.  
STOP the bureaucracy.
attributes.background:
The NHS is appallingly run by over educated staff with Uni' degrees but no real clue.
1000s of targets & pages of stats are filled in daily. Nurses waste 40%+ of their time completing useless papers.
Leave nurses to do what they're meant to do & remove at least 50% min' of NHS administration.

rejection.details: It's not clear exactly what changes you would like to be made to the administration of the NHS. You could start a new petition asking clearly for a specific action.
